remarks:
Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.28 of [Margaris] p. 90.  We don't need the nonempty class condition of ~ r19.28zv when there is an outer quantifier.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2012.) 

---

 Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.28 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2012.)
statement:
rr19.28v $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. A ( ph /\ ps ) <-> A. x e. A ( ph /\ A. y e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
